Song.title: O For A Thousand Tongues To Sing
Song.copyright: Words by Charles Wesley Music by Carl Glaser Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: O [G]for a [D]thousand [G]tongues [D]to [Em]sing, My [G]great Re[C]deemer’s [D]praise, The [G]glories of my [C]God and King, The [G/D]triumphs of [D]His [G]grace
Verse 2: My [G]gracious [D]Master [G]and [D]my [Em]God, As[G]sist me [C]to pro[D]claim, To [G]spread through all the [C]earth abroad, The [G/D]honors of [D]Thy [G]name
Verse 3: Je[G]sus, the [D]name that [G]charms [D]our [Em]fears, That [G]bids our [C]sorrows [D]cease, ‘Tis [G]music in the [C]sinner’s ears, ‘Tis [G/D]life and health [D]and [G]peace
Verse 4: He [G]breaks the [D]power of [G]can[D]celed [Em]sin, He [G]sets the [C]pris’ner [D]free, His [G]blood can make the [C]foulest clean, His [G/D]blood availed [D]for [G]me
Verse 5: Hear [G]Him, ye [D]deaf, His [G]praise, [D]ye [Em]dumb, Your [G]loosened [C]tongues em[D]ploy, Ye [G]blind behold your [C]Savior come, And [G/D]leap ye lame, [D]for [G]joy
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o for a thousand tongues to sing my great redeemers praise the glories of my god and king the triumphs of his grace verse 2 my gracious master and my god assist me to proclaim to spread through all the earth abroad the honors of thy name verse 3 jesus the name that charms our fears that bids our sorrows cease tis music in the sinners ears tis life and health and peace verse 4 he breaks the power of canceled sin he sets the prisner free his blood can make the foulest clean his blood availed for me verse 5 hear him ye deaf his praise ye dumb your loosened tongues employ ye blind behold your savior come and leap ye lame for joy
